// src/pages/About.jsx import React from 'react'; export default function About() { return (
{/* Intro */}

About Me

I hold a B.Eng in Industrial Automation with a focus on Power Systems Control (ASE, 10/2020 – 02/2024), and an M.Sc in Automation IT Systems specializing in Information Technologies Applications (ISA, 03/2024 – 07/2025), both from Wrocław University of Science and Technology. After graduation I relocated to Warsaw, where I began my career in PLC automation and today serve as a Junior NOC Operator, overseeing OpenStack cloud environments.

{/* Experience Timeline */}

Professional Journey

  • PLC Automation Engineer @ KSC Automation
    Feb 2023 – Aug 2023
    Developed and maintained PLC control logic, designed SCADA interfaces, and authored comprehensive technical documentation.
  • Junior NOC Operator @ Cloudferro S.A.
    Nov 2024 – Present
    Monitoring and incident management for OpenStack cloud and Linux infrastructure using Grafana, Prometheus, and Thanos.

Academic Credentials

  • M.Sc Automation IT Systems (ISA)
    Specialization: Information Technologies Applications
    Wrocław University of Science and Technology, Mar 2024 – Jul 2025
  • B.Eng Industrial Automation (ASE)
    Specialization: Power Systems Control
    Wrocław University of Science and Technology, Oct 2020 – Feb 2024
{/* Technical “Hero” Cards */}
{[ { icon: '☁️', title: 'Cloud & DevOps', desc: 'OpenStack, Kubernetes, Docker, Ceph, Ansible, CI/CD pipelines' }, { icon: '⚙️', title: 'Automation & SRE', desc: 'Prometheus, Grafana, Linux, Networking, SRE best-practices' }, { icon: '🤖', title: 'AI & ML', desc: 'Python, Neural Networks, Model Training, MATLAB' }, { icon: '💻', title: 'Web & Backend', desc: 'Java, JavaScript, Node.js, REST APIs, Full-Stack Dev' }, { icon: '🔧', title: 'Infrastructure as Code', desc: 'Ansible, Terraform, Helm, GitOps' }, { icon: '🔒', title: 'Security & Networking', desc: 'Firewalls, VPN, Network Protocols, Secure Deployments' } ].map((card, i) => (
